node.title: A-OK - Glitch Art Face Mask T-Shirt
node.description: The Apes On Keys Glitch Art T-Shirt features a bold, pixel-style typography design that creates a descending cascade effect on a vibrant red background. Below the text, the design incorporates a striking monochromatic illustration of a DJ monkey wearing headphones at a mixing board, rendered in a street art style. The contrast between the sharp black digital text and the artistic monkey illustration creates a unique fusion of digital and urban aesthetics. Perfect for music enthusiasts, digital art lovers, and those who appreciate streetwear with an edge.
node.descriptionHtml: The Apes On Keys Glitch Art T-Shirt features a bold, pixel-style typography design that creates a descending cascade effect on a vibrant red background. Below the text, the design incorporates a striking monochromatic illustration of a DJ monkey wearing headphones at a mixing board, rendered in a street art style. The contrast between the sharp black digital text and the artistic monkey illustration creates a unique fusion of digital and urban aesthetics. Perfect for music enthusiasts, digital art lovers, and those who appreciate streetwear with an edge.

node.title: A-OK - Basic Ape
node.description: The original A-OK Ape. The logo may evolve, but this ape was the beginning of the Symbiocene era. This minimalist t-shirt features a clean, iconic design of a smiling ape wearing headphones and a baseball cap on the front, rendered in crisp white against the shirt. The playful mascot combines DJ culture with a friendly primate aesthetic. On the back, a subtle retro-gaming inspired 'A-OK' pixel text adds a nostalgic touch, completing the design's blend of music and digital culture. The overall look achieves a perfect balance between fun and sophisticated streetwear styling. This shirt is available in black, white (with black ape), red, and grey (as shown here).
node.descriptionHtml:
The original A-OK Ape.

The logo may evolve, but this ape was the beginning of the Symbiocene era.

This minimalist t-shirt features a clean, iconic design of a smiling ape wearing headphones and a baseball cap on the front, rendered in crisp white against the shirt. The playful mascot combines DJ culture with a friendly primate aesthetic. On the back, a subtle retro-gaming inspired 'A-OK' pixel text adds a nostalgic touch, completing the design's blend of music and digital culture. The overall look achieves a perfect balance between fun and sophisticated streetwear styling.

This shirt is available in black, white (with black ape), red, and grey (as shown here).

node.title: A-OK - The Typewriter
node.description: This striking black t-shirt features a bold, vintage-inspired design centered on a detailed illustration of a classic typewriter rendered in crisp white against the dark background. The typewriter's paper roll displays a playful repetition of "A-OK" text variants, much like its keyboard showcases the input text training's impact on the output text. The design skillfully combines retro office aesthetics with modern streetwear sensibilities, creating a unique piece that pays homage to both classic typography and contemporary urban fashion. The squared frame around the typewriter gives the graphic a clean, contained look that makes a strong visual statement. Find the hidden "A-OK" split logo on the typewriter itself.
node.descriptionHtml:
This striking black t-shirt features a bold, vintage-inspired design centered on a detailed illustration of a classic typewriter rendered in crisp white against the dark background. The typewriter's paper roll displays a playful repetition of "A-OK" text variants, much like its keyboard showcases the input text training's impact on the output text. 

The design skillfully combines retro office aesthetics with modern streetwear sensibilities, creating a unique piece that pays homage to both classic typography and contemporary urban fashion. The squared frame around the typewriter gives the graphic a clean, contained look that makes a strong visual statement. Find the hidden "A-OK" split logo on the typewriter itself.

node.title: A-OK - Hype Weight Overload
node.description: This bold black t-shirt features a striking circular design on the front, showcasing our central ape character wearing red and black headphones and an "A-OK" branded cap. The chimp's expressive face and open mouth create a dynamic focal point, surrounded by additional monkey motifs in a stylized, retro-inspired arrangement. The circular emblem uses a clean color palette of black, white, and red accents. The design achieves a perfect balance between playful character art and clean geometric composition, making it an eye-catching piece that captures the brand's music and primate-themed aesthetic.

node.title: A-OK - We Got The Keys
node.description: This black t-shirt features a distinctive white rectangular panel containing a humorous office scene with a group of apes in a business meeting setting. The illustration shows several apes wearing headphones seated around a conference table, with one enthusiastic ape standing and gesturing, all rendered in a three-color palette of black, white, and red accents. The background includes repeating text that reads "I GOT THE KEYS," while a stylized red "A-O-K" tag appears below the main illustration. The design cleverly combines corporate culture parody with the brand's signature ape motif, creating a witty commentary on modern workplace dynamics.
node.descriptionHtml: This black t-shirt features a distinctive white rectangular panel containing a humorous office scene with a group of apes in a business meeting setting. node.title: A-OK - NextJS Is Nice Space Ape
node.description: This black t-shirt features a modern tech-inspired design with a white squared frame containing a sophisticated ape character sporting headphones and sunglasses, surrounded by NextJs branding and various tech-themed icons and elements. The design includes geometric shapes, rocket icons, and UI-style elements that create a developer-focused aesthetic. Below the main illustration, the A-OK brand name appears in crisp white pixel-style typography, giving the shirt a perfect blend of coding culture and street style. The monochromatic color scheme keeps the design clean and professional while maintaining the playful nature of the brand's signature ape character.

node.title: A-OK - 12MM Monkeys
node.description: This charcoal gray t-shirt features a striking white rectangular design with a graffiti-style illustration of a focused chimpanzee producer at a keyboard, wearing headphones and a cap. Behind the main character, smaller monkeys appear at the keys, creating a playful depth to the scene. The artwork is topped with bold "12MM MONKEYS" text and accented with splashes of red that add urban flair to the composition. Below the main graphic, the A-OK brand name appears in classic pixel-style typography in white. The design combines street art aesthetics with music production culture, creating a perfect blend of urban style and audio technology references. And yes, this is an homage to 12 Monkeys.

node.title: A-OK - Monkey Master
node.description: This white t-shirt features a striking design set in a rounded-corner red square, depicting the DJ A-OK as a puppet master wearing headphones and a cap. The main character looms large against the red background, controlling a line of smaller marching ape figures below with puppet strings. The design is rendered in a bold three-color scheme of white, black, and red, creating a powerful contrast. The back of the shirt is minimal with just a red rectangular badge featuring the reversed "A-OK" text in pixel style, adding a subtle branded touch. The overall design cleverly combines the brand's music culture with a unique puppet master motif, creating an eye-catching streetwear piece.

node.title: A-OK - Octo Ape
node.description: Unleash your inner AI geek* with the bold and creative Octo-Ape T-Shirt from the Apes On Keys (A-OK) fashion line. This design features a wildly imaginative octopus-armed ape wearing the iconic A-OK cap and headphones, feverishly typing on a vintage typewriter amidst a flurry of scattered pages—perfectly capturing the chaotic brilliance of AI-driven innovation. Printed on a premium black tee, this eye-catching graphic makes a statement about embracing creativity and technology with a touch of humor and style. Whether you’re coding, brainstorming, or just turning heads, this shirt keeps you feeling A-OK! *Apes On Keys is inspired by the infinite monkey theorem
node.descriptionHtml:
Unleash your inner AI geek* with the bold and creative Octo-Ape T-Shirt from the Apes On Keys (A-OK) fashion line. This design features a wildly imaginative octopus-armed ape wearing the iconic A-OK cap and headphones, feverishly typing on a vintage typewriter amidst a flurry of scattered pages—perfectly capturing the chaotic brilliance of AI-driven innovation. Printed on a premium black tee, this eye-catching graphic makes a statement about embracing creativity and technology with a touch of humor and style. Whether you’re coding, brainstorming, or just turning heads, this shirt keeps you feeling A-OK!

*Apes On Keys is inspired by the infinite monkey theorem
